name: Goblin
description: Goblins are small, black-hearted, selfish humanoids that lair in caves, abandoned mines, depsoiled dungeons and other dismal settings. Individually weak, goblins gather in large - sometimes overwhelming - numbers. They crave power and regularly abuse whatever authority they obtain.
special: Nimble Escape. The goblin can take the disengage or hide action as a bonus action on each of it's turns.
